io_metrics.name: volume_overall_read_io_rate
io_metrics.description: The rate of read I/O operations per second for the volume

io_metrics.name: volume_overall_write_io_rate
io_metrics.description: The rate of write I/O operations per second for the volume

io_metrics.name: volume_overall_total_io_rate
io_metrics.description: The total number of I/O operations (read + write) per second for the volume

data_rate_metrics.name: volume_read_data_rate
data_rate_metrics.description: The amount of data read from the volume per second (in bytes/sec)

data_rate_metrics.name: volume_write_data_rate
data_rate_metrics.description: The amount of data write from the volume per second (in bytes/sec)

data_rate_metrics.name: volume_total_data_rate
data_rate_metrics.description: Total data read and written per second for the volume (read + write)

response_time_metrics.name: volume_read_response_time
response_time_metrics.description: The average time taken to complete read operations on the volume

response_time_metrics.name: volume_write_response_time
response_time_metrics.description: The average time taken to complete write operations on the volume

response_time_metrics.name: volume_total_response_time
response_time_metrics.description: The overall average response time for read and write operations on the volume

transfer_size_metrics.name: volume_read_transfer_size
transfer_size_metrics.description: The average amount of bytes transferred per read per operation

transfer_size_metrics.name: volume_write_transfer_size
transfer_size_metrics.description: The average amount of bytes transferred per write per operation

transfer_size_metrics.name: volume_total_transfer_size
transfer_size_metrics.description: Total data transferred for read and write operation

cpu_utilization_metrics.name: cpu_utilization
cpu_utilization_metrics.description: The percentage of CPU capacity currently being utilized

capacity_metrics.name: used_capacity
capacity_metrics.description: The amount of storage currently used on the system or volume

capacity_metrics.name: available_capacity
capacity_metrics.description: The amount of storage available for use on the system or volume
